newsitem.title: USA: Storm now typhoon off Okinawa, southern Japan-WSC.
newsitem.headline: Storm now typhoon off Okinawa, southern Japan-WSC.

text.p: Tropical storm Peter has strengthened to a typhoon in the western Pacific and is threatening Okinawa and southern Japan, forecaster Weather Services Corp said.
The storm is less than 175 miles south of Okinawa and moving north about 10 mph with top winds of 85 mph.

Peter is expected to have top winds near 100 mph when it passes just west of Okinawa in 12-18 hours. After that, landfall is expected in Kyushu in 24-30 hours, bringing the likelihood of a storm surge and coastal flooding, heavy rain with flash flooding, mudslides and damaging winds, especially in Kyushu, WSC added.
